What is Crypterium

Crypterium is a blockchain-based platform designed to be a full-fledged and complete crypto banking service in the field of crypto. Crypterium features issuing plastic cards for everyday use, loans in crypto, open API free for integration, an integrated crypto exchange, acquisition and scoring. In short, the project is focused on creating all the package of service that a traditional bank can offer.

The main token of the platform is known under the CRPT ticker. It is an independent coin that serves as the main asset of the Crypterium’s ecosystem. It can be bought, sold or traded like any other cryptocurrency.

The team behind the project is convinced that they can create an ultimate banking solution in the field of crypto. They aim at making crypto a widely-adopted thing by offering easy, quick and simple services. The company’s high goals seem not to be just words as it’s headed by Steven Parker, a former Visa’s general manager in the region of Central and Eastern Europe. The team includes many other experienced experts from fintech and crypto projects all over the globe.

The global crypto community also warmly welcomed the project. On the stage of the ICO and public sales start Crypterium gathered $51 million of investments — it is 10% more than their initial target. Crypto portals and experts have been quite positive as well stating that Crypterium is the project that brings fresh ideas to the great crypto game.

According to the project’s outline, the next milestone is integrating different major cryptocurrencies into the platform. This means that users will be able to manage and spend different crypto assets using only one system. All in all, Crypterium is a project that can possibly bring real worldwide adoption of cryptocurrency to the world offering handy solutions that anyone can use on a daily basis.

On top of that, CRPT is still a cryptocurrency. Since it’s listed on different exchanges and services, it can be bought, sold or traded like any other asset.

Crypterium Price

CRPT has a comparatively short lifespan so far — it was released on the market in January 2018. Since that moment, it has faced periods of growth and falls along with the whole crypto market. According to the CoinMarketCap portal’s data, the initial price of CRPT was $3 on the 23rd of January 2018. Like for many other cryptocurrencies, it was a bright start as that price is the highest of all time so far. After that, the rate went into a nosedive and established in the range under $1. The price traded within the first half of the year and then took a sideways trying to make it to the level of $0,8. At the end of the year 2018, the coin faced its all-time low of $0,065 on December 7.

The first half of 2019 was marked by a flatline for the CRPT’s chart. It began the year at the price of $0,1 and had an increase to the height of $0,25 in February. After that, the rate went into a bullish trend starting at the beginning of June. That trend led the coin to the almost 200% increase within 6 months. As of this writing in December 2019, the current price of CRPT is $0,344053 or 0,00004704 BTC. CoinMarketCap displays a total market cap of $34 310 327 which makes CRPT #96 in the overall cryptocurrencies ranking. Crypterium’s daily trading volume is $186 443. There is 99 723 908 CRPT in current circulation. It’s remarkable that no total or maximum supply levels are set by developers. The current ROI compared to the initial price is −54,13%.

As for now, Crypterium takes promising positions. Many cryptocurrency experts and prediction portals highlight CRPT as an asset worth noticing.

  • Wallet Investor forecast service predicts that CRPT will rise in the nearest future. According to the data the website displays, the coin will cost $0,798 at the end of 2020 and $2,565 in 2024.
  • Tradingbeasts are more modest but still optimistic in their forecast. Their price prediction states that Crypterium will cost $0,3904 in December 2020.
  • Oodlebit crypto portal also has a positive opinion about the future of CRPT. They published an analysis article with forecasts stating that the price will soar to the level of $0,502 in 2021.

Yet this article should not be taken as financial advice, Crypterium is obviously worth considering as an investment option.
